mapper.insert:
SELECT providedGoodId_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO providedGood_tb(providedGoodId, roomId, providedGood) VALUES(#{providedGoodId}, #{roomId}, #{providedGood})
mapper.update: UPDATE providedGood_tb SET providedGood = #{providedGood} WHERE roomId = #{roomId} AND providedGoodId = #{providedGoodId}
mapper.select: SELECT roomId, providedGoodId, providedGood FROM providedGood_tb WHERE roomId = #{roomId}
SELECT roomId, providedGoodId, providedGood FROM providedGood_tb WHERE providedGoodId = #{providedGoodId}
